src.desc: [optional] Pass markdown in as a property

toc.desc: Set to true if you want a TOC automatically generated

toc-start.desc: The starting Header number for generating a TOC

toc-end.desc: The ending Header number for generating a TOC. Must be greater than tocStart

task-lists-enable.desc: Set to true to enable (not read-only) Task Lists

task-lists-label.desc: Set to true to wrap the rendered list items in a <label> element for UX purposes

task-lists-label-after.desc: to add the label after the checkbox (requires `task-lists-label` to be set to `true`)

toc.desc: If `toc` property is `true` then if a TOC is generated it is emitted via this event

tocData.desc: Array of one or more TOC data objects

id.desc: The id for the TOC header

default.desc: This is the default slot to be used for markdown
